summary: Learn about .XCP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use XCP Unpack to extract the contents of an XCP file that contains a Games on Demand game or a game demo. XCP Unpack will save the unpacked XCP file's contents as a .GOD package.
If your XCP file contains a different type of Xbox content, you will not be able to open it or extract its contents.
